                Barry Frost  May 28th 2017, 18:13
                
      A couple of recent site/Transformative changes: 


I’m now using Acquiescence, my new IndieAuth server for auth/tokens, on this domain.
You can subscribe to a new JSON feed for homepage content. The RSS feed hasn’t gone away but I thought I’d also support the new JSON Feed format.
